from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv(Path(''.env''))
env = os.getenv(''ENVIRONMENT'')
print(f''ENVIRONMENT={env}'')
print(f''DEV_AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME={os.getenv(""DEV_AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME"")}'')
print(f''PROD_AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME={os.getenv(""PROD_AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME"")}'')
")

Bash(uv run python -c "
from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient

conn_str = ''DefaultEndpointsProtocol=http;AccountName=devstoreaccount1;AccountKey=Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==;BlobEndpoint=http://127.0.0.1:10000/devstoreaccount1;QueueEndpoint=http://127.0.0.1:10001/devstoreaccount1;''
blob_service = BlobServiceClient.from_connection_string(conn_str)

# Test with small content
container_client = blob_service.get_container_client(''ocr-processing-input'')
blob_client = container_client.get_blob_client(''test.txt'')
blob_client.upload_blob(b''Test content'', overwrite=True)
print(''✓ Successfully uploaded test file to Azurite'')

# Try to read it back
data = blob_client.download_blob().readall()
print(f''✓ Successfully downloaded test file: {data.decode()}'')
")
